Registration

If you want to attend the workshop, please fill in the form available here.

The registration deadline is December 5. Participation is free of charge.

Please write from the same email address that you used for registering.

Submission of talk proposals

If you want to give a talk, please submit an abstract (max 1 page in pdf) to:

francesco.gavazzo [at] unipi [dot] it

no later than November 20. Talks will be approximately 30 minutes long. We plan to schedule talks on Monday afternoon and Tuesday morning.
